what: A Data Package with Urban Land Cover Classifications for a Selection of Cities in the Brazilian Amazon
title: A Data Package with Urban Land Cover Classifications for a Selection of Cities in the Brazilian Amazon
text: amazonULC package aims provide land cover classification maps Brazilian Amazonian cities. Land cover maps can contribute urban planning Amazonian cities, applications monitoring urban sprawl, environmental protection areas, assisting urban zoning, identifying areas high building density, among others. amazonULC provides urban land cover classification cities Altamira, Cametá, Marabá, Santarém part Metropolitan Area Belém, state Pará, Brazilian Legal Amazon. maps following land cover classes: “Shrub Vegetation” (SV), “Herbaceous Vegetation” (HV), “Water” (Wa), “Exposed Ground” (EG), “High Gloss Cover” (HG), “Ceramic Cover” (Ce), “Fiber Cement Cover” (FC), “Asphalt Road” (), “Terrain Road” (Te), “Cloud” (Cl) “Shadow” (Sh).

what: Urban Land Cover for the City of Altamira - Para State, Brazil (year of 2020) — altamira_class
title: Urban Land Cover for the City of Altamira - Para State, Brazil (year of 2020) — altamira_class
text: simple features data frame features land cover classification Altamira. order obtain classification, used mean-shift algorithm segment orthorectified image Wide Scan Multispectral Panchromatic Camera (WPM) China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite (CBERS-4A), dated 07/31/2020 (path: 215, row: 117). WMP-CBERS image 2 m spatial resolution panchromatic camera 8 m multispectral camera. segmentation, extracted segment's spectral, Grey-Level Co-occurrence Matrix texture measurements (GLCM), biophysical index, geometry attributes. , random stratified sampling, classified segments Random Forest machine learning algorithm. final classification accuracy 88% testing samples (30% sample base). classified area overlaps urban limit Altamira 152 km². data WGS84 Coordinate Systems, EPSG 4326. polygons classified :"Shrub Vegetation" (SV), "Herbaceous Vegetation" (HV), "Water" (Wa), "Exposed Ground" (EG), "High Gloss Cover" (HG), "Ceramic Cover" (Ce), "Fiber Cement Cover" (FC), "Asphalt Road" (), "Terrain Road" (Te), "Cloud" (Cl) "Shadow" (Sh).
